verses.text_plain: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.

1Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength. ▼
▼ chief…: or, overseer

verses.text_plain: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
verses.verse_html: 2Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.

verses.text_plain: For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 3For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.
